column3: Back

I don’t hate it. Actually, I quite like it.
I thought it was easy. Actually, it was really hard.
I was going to say no. Actually, yes please.
It looks small. Actually, it’s huge inside.
I wasn’t tired. Actually, I was exhausted.

It’s not cheap. In fact, it’s ridiculously expensive.
I don’t just like it. In fact, I love it.
He’s not upset. In fact, he’s delighted.
The traffic isn’t bad. In fact, it’s awful.
I didn’t sleep well. In fact, I didn’t sleep at all.

As a matter of fact, I was just about to call you.
As a matter of fact, I’ve already finished.
As a matter of fact, I hate coffee.
As a matter of fact, she’s my cousin.
As a matter of fact, I was born in 1999.

Believe it or not, I used to be a DJ.
Believe it or not, I passed first time.
Believe it or not, he’s only 25.
Believe it or not, I’ve never left the country.
Believe it or not, I actually enjoyed it.

To be honest, I’m completely exhausted.
To be honest, I didn’t study at all.
To be honest, I only came for the food.
To be honest, I have no idea.
To be honest, I don’t really like parties.

Seriously, you need to stop eating junk food.
Seriously, that’s the best pizza ever.
Seriously, where have you been?
Seriously, this traffic is ridiculous.
Seriously, thank you so much.

This is definitely the best coffee in town.
You should definitely come tonight.
Definitely worth watching.
Definitely not going out in this rain.
Definitely buying another one.

That’s absolutely correct.
Absolutely delicious!
Absolutely freezing outside.
Absolutely no way.
Absolutely love this song.

I’m totally exhausted.
Totally agree with you.
Totally forgot about that.
Totally in love with this place.
Totally broke right now.

Completely forgot your birthday.
Completely different from last time.
Completely understand.
Completely soaked.
Completely full – no more cake!

It’s really cold today.
Do you really mean that?
I really appreciate your help.
Really good news!
This is really annoying.

Thank you very much.
It’s very kind of you.
Very interesting idea.
Not very happy about this.
Very well done!

Extremely tired after the gym.
Extremely expensive restaurant.
Extremely happy with the result.
Extremely hot weather.
Extremely proud of you.

Incredibly beautiful view.
Incredibly fast service.
Incredibly lucky escape.
Incredibly talented singer.
Incredibly busy week.

Surprisingly, nobody complained.
Surprisingly good coffee.
Surprisingly easy exam.
Surprisingly warm for December.
Surprisingly quiet tonight.

Obviously, we can’t go in this weather.
Obviously, I was joking.
Obviously, she’s upset.
Obviously, that’s not true.
Obviously, you’re tired.

Clearly, something needs to change.
Clearly, he doesn’t want to talk.
Clearly, this isn’t working.
Clearly, you’ve worked hard.
Clearly, it’s broken.

No doubt the best player on the team.
No doubt we’ll win.
No doubt she’s lying.
No doubt it’ll rain later.
No doubt you’re right.

Without a doubt the best meal I’ve had.
Without a doubt my favourite film.
Without a doubt the hardest exam.
Without a doubt worth the money.
Without a doubt coming again.

Hands down the best pizza in town.
Hands down the funniest person I know.
Hands down the worst traffic ever.
Hands down my favourite season.
Hands down winner.

By far the best coffee I’ve tasted.
By far the most difficult part.
By far the coldest winter.
By far the strangest day.
By far the biggest mistake.

I’m literally dying of laughter.
Literally shaking with excitement.
Literally haven’t slept in days.
Literally the best news ever.
Literally freezing in here.

Pretty much finished the project.
Pretty much the same every day.
Pretty much broke after shopping.
Pretty much perfect weather.
Pretty much impossible to find.

Basically, we’re out of time.
Basically, you just press this button.
Basically, nobody cares.
Basically, it’s impossible.
Basically, yes please!

Essentially, we’re saying the same thing.
Essentially, it’s ready to go.
Essentially, nothing has changed.
Essentially, I agree with you.
Essentially, it’s too late.
